channel.title: How do i change direction of an object i put?
channel.description:
so i places a bank booth but its faceing west to east how do i make it face north to south
??? please help
like a satue for example its faceing > how i make it face ^ please help

item.title: How do i change direction of an object i put?
item.dc:creator: @b_b0yz_4 b b0yz 4
item.description:
@b_b0yz_4 wrote:

ok the second to last number in there makeGlobalObject thing before the 10. If you want to face N = 0, E = -1, S = -2, W = -3
